title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.7 - Scope of audit and report of CPA
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.7 - Scope of audit and report of CPA
State Regulations
A company shall have financial statements furnished pursuant to section
89.3
of this Part audited by the CPA. The audit of the company's financial statements shall be conducted in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
89.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
